name: Rick
line: Morty! You gotta come on. Jus'... you gotta come with me.

name: Morty
line: What, Rick? What’s going on?

name: Rick
line: I got a surprise for you, Morty.

name: Morty
line: It's the middle of the night. What are you talking about?

name: Rick
line: Come on, I got a surprise for you.  Come on, hurry up.

name: Morty
line: Ow! Ow! You're tugging me too hard!

name: Rick
line: We gotta go, gotta get outta here, come on. Got a surprise for you Morty.

name: Rick
line: What do you think of this... flying vehicle, Morty? I built it outta stuff I found in the garage.

name: Morty
line: Yeah, Rick... I-it's great. Is this the surprise?

name: Rick
line: Morty. I had to... I had to do it. I had— I had to— I had to make a bomb, Morty. I had to create a bomb.

name: Morty
line: What?! A bomb?!

name: Rick
line: We're gonna drop it down there just get a whole fresh start, Morty. Create a whole fresh start.

name: Morty
line: T-t-that's absolutely crazy!

name: Rick
line: Come on, Morty. Just take it easy, Morty. It's gonna be good. Right now, we're gonna go pick up your little friend Jessica.

name: Morty
line: Jessica? From my math class?

name: Rick
line: When I drop the bomb you know, I want you to have somebody, you know? I want you to have the thing. I'm gonna make it like a new Adam and Eve, and you're gonna be Adam.

name: Morty
line: Ohh...

name: Rick
line: And Jessica's gonna be Eve.

name: Morty
line: Whhhh-wha?

name: Rick
line: And so that's the surprise, Morty.

name: Morty
line: No, you can't!  Jessica doesn't even know I exist! But—but, but forget about that, because you can't blow up humanity!

name: Rick
line: I-I get what you're trying to say, Morty. Listen, I'm not...  You don't got... Y-you don’t gotta worry about me trying to fool around with Jessica or mess around with Jessica or anything. I'm not that kind of guy, Morty.

name: Morty
line: What are you talking about, Rick?

name: Rick
line: You-you don't have to worry about me getting with Jessica or anything. Sh-sh-she— she, she, she's all for you, Morty.

name: Morty
line: I don't care about Jessica! Y-Yyyyyyyyyyou—

name: Rick
line: You know what, Morty? You're right.  Let's forget the girl altogether. She, she's probably nothing but trouble, anyways.

name: Morty
line: That's it... that's it, Rick. I'm taking the wheel.

name: Rick
line: Get off of me, Morty!

name: Morty
line: I'm taking charge of this situation, buddy!  I'm put—I’m, I'm, I'm, I'm puttin’... I-I’m, I’m, I’m not gonna stand around like some sort of dumb... dumb person and just le-let you ruin the whole world!
